channel.title: KIKI Engineering Blog
channel.description: AI, ML, compliance, and product engineering insights from KIKI.

item.title: Building a 94.7% Accurate LTV Prediction Model with TensorFlow and gRPC
item.description: How we engineered SyncValue's lifetime value model for sub-100ms latency and 94.7% accuracy using TensorFlow, Feast, and gRPC.

item.title: Scaling to 10M Messages/Hour: Our Go Microservices Architecture
item.description: How SyncEngage processes 10M+ retention messages per hour with Go, Kafka, and Kubernetes autoscaling.

item.title: GDPR Article 7 Consent: Implementation Guide for SaaS Platforms
item.description: Practical patterns for consent capture, proofs, and revocation backed by blockchain-grade audit trails.

item.title: Introducing Multi-Variant Creative Generation with SyncCreate
item.description: Generate five TikTok-ready video variants in minutes using scene-aware prompts, motion guardrails, and TTS alignment.

item.title: Zero-Trust Security Architecture: Our Journey to SOC 2 Type II
item.description: Lessons from achieving SOC 2 Type II: mTLS everywhere, OPA sidecars, audit logging, and incident response.

item.title: Feature Engineering for Churn Prediction: 50+ Behavioral Signals
item.description: Behavioral, financial, and adoption signals that improve churn prediction recall and lead time.

item.title: How We Helped a FinTech Reduce Churn by 38% in 90 Days
item.description: PayFlow Financial case study: LTV scoring, risk alerts, and multi-channel retention plays that cut churn by 38%.
